text: Adubu Tengban Mapubu thagatpa oisanu! Maramdi Christtaga amata oina punsinnahanbiduna Christtagi lan-ngambagi khongchatta lanpha oina Tengban Mapuna matam pumnamakta eikhoibu chingbiri. Amasung Christtabu khangbagi nungsiba manam adubu mapham pumnamakta sandokpada Tengbang Mapuna eikhoibu sijinnabiri.
